Скилчеки зло

DBD is a top secret torture method that is developed by behavior. This game is very bad and  you have to be mentally handicapped to get any fun from this game. Thankfully spending about 30 minutes in dbd makes you retarded. In dbd you can visit very interesting locations like ormond or haddonfield... nothing else. This game will bring you very fun experience and fond memories, like people wishing that your whole family dies of cancer. You can play as the survivors who need to repair generators to escape. Playing survivor is very easy considering this game is very balanced. The only thing you need to watch out for are random survivors that have the intellect of a plant vs zombies pea shooter. You can also play the killer who kills the survivors. Don't worry, out of every killer only like 2 are viable on high ranks. And you need to apply pressure to 4 people at the same time while you're playing padded jaws trapper. Thankfully after 4 years this game still feels like it's in beta. It's not dbd if the map doesn't have sh1tty hitboxes and is full with bugs. This game also consists of very fun cosmetics like a 15$  skin and pure cancer. Overall this game is very sh1t. It's also like 100$ with every DLC. 10/10. Would Recommend

best game

Well tbh this game is hard to start with. If you just take in consideration that there are more than 40 charakters and everyone has three special perks and additionally you can bring to every game many different offerings aswell as items (not to mention their add-ons). So overall you have many things to learn and adapt to them and the game doesn't get boring even with the 450 hours I spent in the game. Dbd is a game that brings me joy to play with friends aswell as alone to slap some survivors or play survivor to spin some killers. sure there some mad lads that make a trial unfun to play but thats just the minority. Overall I highly recommend to try for yourself.

Dead by Daylight is a multiplayer horror game with asymmetrical multiplayer where players can act out their favorite horror movie scenes. Four players will have to confront one maniac, which can be selected from a large list, before the game begins. On the part of the survivors, it is required to leave the territory in all possible ways - it can be either a hatch or the main gate. The gate can only be activated thanks to five generators running, which the maniac carefully checks. The main and only task of the maniac is to capture all four survivors in order to successfully complete the round.

The players don't know where the maniac is, and they need to do a few different things before they leave the area. At the same time, the Maniac has a set of various abilities that allow him to resist the survivors, but he is alone, and alone he is not able to cope with all the survivors. Therefore, he has to carefully examine the territory, searching every meter of space in order to find survivors.

Something should be fixed about killers tunneling and camping. Survivors should have the perk borrowed time and decisive strike built in as base perks to counter killers who do that. And whoever thinks that noed is a perk that should exist has issues. A killer should be rewarded for winning chases, outplaying survivors through mindgames and not get rewarded for losing the whole game and still get 3 or 4k from noed. Pls do something abt this.

Started out playing because it was the only 5 player option that sounded good. Now we're hooked! There's a huge variety of maps and killers and survivors so you don't get bored quickly and you can play with friends or strangers, or both!  The only real issue is that the people playing the killer can farm you at the end of the game. If you are last alive, and can't escape, they can run down the timer harassing you in various ways to farm points.  Most people don't though.  Overall 8/10 would recommend
Fun,but have no expectations for balancing

O jogo é bugado, desbalanceado, LAGADO DEMAIS (você pula uma janela, sai correndo e toma um hit wi-fi do mesmo jeito), mecânica chata de só fazer gerador estando de survivor, ou tomar gen rush de time tryhard estando de killer. Cada vez que a Behavior adiciona algo pro jogo, é sempre pra piorar ele.
 Enfim, o jogo é uma bosta, mas por algum motivo é muito divertido. O que fez eu deixar análise negativa é esse servidor nojento que fala que é 20 de ping a sala, mas parece que ta 1000+
